name: Tales of Zunderia I: So it begins (prototype)
name_original: Tales of Zunderia I: So it begins (prototype)
description:
This is a prototype of my upcoming game series, Tales of Zunderia. It's a top-down (2.5D) action adventure.

The graphics are mostly based on Top-Down Adventure Pack by o_lobster.

Give it a go and tell me what you think. Any and all criticism is most welcome!

Controls

Movement: Arrow keys

Attack: [SPACE]

Move/drop/use items: Mouse

Pause/unpause: [ESC]
